net.truelicense.maven.plugin.generation

Class GenerateTestSourcesMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • net.truelicense.maven.plugin.commons.MojoAdapter
        • net.truelicense.maven.plugin.generation.GenerateSourcesMojo
          • net.truelicense.maven.plugin.generation.GenerateTestSourcesMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="generate-test-sources",
      defaultPhase=GENERATE_TEST_SOURCES)
public final class GenerateTestSourcesMojo
extends GenerateSourcesMojo
    Generates test source files by merging a set of Apache Velocity template files with all properties in the Maven POM.
    Since:
    TrueLicense 2.4
    Author:
